title.rendered: Upcoming Winter Concerts Throughout The District

content.rendered:
Don’t miss our talented student musicians perform in the following winter concerts throughout the district:

  • December 6: SSHS Chorus Concert in the HS Auditorium at 7 p.m.
  • December 11: Grade 6 and HS Concert Orchestra in the Maple Avenue Auditorium at 7 p.m.
  • December 12: Grade 8 and HS Chamber Orchestra Concert in the Maple Avenue Auditorium at 7 p.m.
  • December 12:  Grade 7 and HS Symphonic Orchestra Concert in the Maple Avenue Auditorium at 7 p.m.
  • December 18: Concert and Symphonic Band Concert in the HS Auditorium at 7 p.m.
  • December 19: Grade 6 Band at 6:30 p.m. and Grades 7&8 at 7:15 p.m. in the Maple Avenue Auditorium
  • January 10:  Grade 7 and 8 Chorus in the Maple Avenue Auditorium at 7 p.m.
  • January 17: Grade 6 Chorus in the Maple Avenue Auditorium at 7 p.m.

Be sure to check the calendar of events often for all school events.
